attributes.action: Put a box junction on beech road to stop congestion as it is a turning point in Luton
attributes.additional_details:
We need a box junction at the top end of beech road because it's a no through road also the area is a very busy high street on Dunstable road. The residents are fed up having problems to turn their cars also visitors to the road have difficulty to turn, residents on beech road face difficulty day in day out which they learn to adapt but visitor face immense problems which cause road rage at times, also a big problem we face when football matches are. I would kindly ask you to resolve this issue please ASAP.

With kind regards


Mohammed Noor

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
